alert.note: Alert for Northern Humboldt Interior; Northern Trinity; Southern Humboldt Interior; Southern Trinity; Southwestern Humboldt (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 26 at 2:12PM PDT until March 29 at 5:00AM PDT by NWS Eureka
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM MONDAY TO 5 AM PDT WEDNESDAY ABOVE 2000 FEET... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected above 2000 feet. Total snow accumulations of 7 to 24 inches. Higher snow amounts will occur across taller ridges. Winds gusting as high as 70 mph. * WHERE...Southwestern Humboldt, Northern Humboldt Interior, Southern Humboldt Interior, Northern Trinity and Southern Trinity Counties. * WHEN...From 5 PM Monday to 5 AM PDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. Very strong winds could cause extensive tree damage.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state of California can be obtained by calling 1-800-GAS-ROAD.

area.areaDesc: Northern Humboldt Interior; Northern Trinity; Southern Humboldt Interior; Southern Trinity; Southwestern Humboldt
